quote: Your intent is your Compass. If your intent is simply to ask about the vacation, then that's your Compass.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the fear of over-communicating with clients.
suggested_hook: Are you afraid of annoying your clients? Here's why you shouldn't be.

quote: I've never had so many people reach out, share their stories with me. We have conversations.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of vulnerability in building connections.
suggested_hook: Vulnerability can be your greatest strength. Here's how it worked for Sergio.
